Posts.Content: Dear Wayne..I read you brief message from April 5 and since I have metasticized lung cancer, I am very interested in what you might recommend... I have had chemo in 2003 for 10 months, then Iressa for lyear until it failed, then Tarceva, and it didnt work, and now back on a new chemo, Alimta. I know there are many alternatives, diets, herbs, but all seem confusing and risky. I would appreicate hearing from you if possible Bill
Posts.Title: Has Anyone Had Success With Alternative Treatments?
